#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

inline int read(){

	char c = getchar() ;
	int n = 0 ;

	while( c<48 || c>57 ) c = getchar() ;

	while( c>=48 && c<=57 ){
	
		n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + (c-48) ;
		c = getchar() ;
	}
	return n ;
}

int main(){

	int T , numDoors ;
	T = read() ;

	while(T--){
	
		numDoors = read() ;
		printf("%d\n",(int)sqrtf(numDoors)) ;
	}
	return 0 ;
}
